mapper.select: SELECT no,title,chef,poster,num FROM (SELECT no,title,chef,poster,rownum as num FROM (SELECT no,title,chef,poster FROM recipe)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT no,title,chef,poster,num FROM (SELECT no,title,chef,poster,rownum as num FROM (SELECT no,title,chef,poster FROM recipe WHERE chef=#{chef})) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT CEIL(COUNT(*)/20.0) FROM recipe WHERE chef=#{chef}
